// 陈水扁 var ach_ID_LIEN = 68; // 连战 var ach_ID_SOONG = 69; // 宋楚瑜 // 1. 获取大选赢家 (防止数据未加载时报错) var ach_winnerID = (e.final_overall_results && e.final_overall_results.length > 0) ? e.final_overall_results[0].candidate : 0; // 2. 获取玩家普选票百分比 var ach_playerVote = FINAL_VOTE_PERCENT; // 3. 获取玩家赢得的县市数量 var ach_winCount = (typeof quickstats !== 'undefined' && quickstats.length > 0) ? quickstats[0] : 0; // 4. 获取难度 (Hell = 0.75) var ach_diff = campaignTrail_temp.difficulty_level_multiplier; // 5. 获取 NPC 的全台得票率 (PVP) - 安全获取函数 function getSafePvp(id) { var c = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_json.find(function(x) { return x.pk === id; }); return c ? c.pvp : 0; } var ach_chen_pvp = getSafePvp(ach_ID_CHEN); var ach_lien_pvp = getSafePvp(ach_ID_LIEN); var ach_soong_pvp = getSafePvp(ach_ID_SOONG); // --- 核心辅助函数：获取指定县市的赢家和数据 --- function getAchStateStats(stateId) { // 在 e.final_state_results 中查找对应 ID 的州 var stateData = e.final_state_results.find(function(s) { return s.state === stateId; }); if (!stateData) return null; // 判定赢家：使用 .result (加权分) var winnerObj = stateData.result.reduce(function(best, curr) { return (curr.result > best.result) ? curr : best; }); // 计算该县市总票数 var totalVotes = stateData.result.reduce(function(sum, item) { return sum + item.votes; }, 0); return { winnerId: winnerObj.candidate, results: stateData.result, totalVotes: totalVotes }; } // --- 核心辅助函数：检查某候选人是否赢得了 0 个县市 --- function achHasWonZeroStates(candidateId) { // 只要找到任意一个县市的赢家是该候选人，就返回 false var hasWin = e.final_state_results.some(function(s) { var w = s.result.reduce(function(best, curr) { return (curr.result > best.result) ? curr : best; }); return w.candidate === candidateId; }); return !hasWin; // 如果没找到任何胜利，返回 true (也就是赢了0个) } // ==================================================================== // 🚩 核心變量與常數定義 (請確保這些變量在程式碼運行前已定義) // ==================================================================== if (campaignTrail_temp.candidate_id === ach_ID_LIEN) { // Return to Normalcy if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN) { ctsAchievement("Return to Normalcy"); } // Lee's Loyal Dog (李登辉亲密度 > 5) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN && e.LeeTengHuiAttacks > 5) { ctsAchievement("Lee's Loyal Dog"); } // Master of My Own Fate (李登辉亲密度 < 0) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN && e.LeeTengHuiAttacks < 0) { ctsAchievement("Master of My Own Fate"); } // Bluer than Blue (>= 22 县市，且包含南投 258) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN && ach_winCount >= 22) { var nt = getAchStateStats(258); if (nt && nt.winnerId === ach_ID_LIEN) { ctsAchievement("Bluer than Blue"); } } // Vanguard of Reform (政治改革 > 5) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN && e.PoliticalReformPromise > 5) { ctsAchievement("Vanguard of Reform"); } // New Godfather (政治改革 <= 0) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN && e.PoliticalReformPromise <= 0) { ctsAchievement("New Godfather"); } // The Sinking Ship (输掉且得票率 < 25%) if (ach_winnerID !== ach_ID_LIEN && ach_playerVote < 25) { ctsAchievement("The Sinking Ship"); } // Continuous Victory (赢且陈水扁 0 县市) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN && achHasWonZeroStates(ach_ID_CHEN)) { ctsAchievement("Continuous Victory"); } // Blue Consolidation (赢且宋楚瑜 < 25%) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN && e.candidate_json[2].pvp < 0.25) { ctsAchievement("Blue Consolidation"); } // Chan Comes Home (台南市 251 得票率 > 40%) var tnCity = getAchStateStats(251); if (tnCity && tnCity.winnerId === ach_ID_LIEN) { var lienData = tnCity.results.find(function(r){ return r.candidate === ach_ID_LIEN; }); if (lienData) { var lienPercent = (lienData.votes / tnCity.totalVotes) * 100; if (lienPercent > 40) { ctsAchievement("Chan Comes Home"); } } } // VP > Governor (赢且宋楚瑜 0 县市) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_LIEN && achHasWonZeroStates(ach_ID_SOONG)) { ctsAchievement("VP > Governor"); } return construct(0); } } //vp var changeGameDisp = (hide) => { disp = ""; if (hide) { disp = "none"; } Array.from(gameWindow.children).forEach(f=>{ if(!f.classList.contains("game_header") && (f.id != "main_content_area" || !$("#campaign_sign")[0])) f.style.display = disp }); }; e.vpSwitcher = () => { let potential_running_mate_pks = e.running_mate_json.filter(f=>f.fields.candidate == e.candidate_id).map(f=>f.fields.running_mate); let pot_run_mat = potential_running_mate_pks.map(f=>e.candidate_json.find(_f=>_f.pk===f)); let running_mate_options = ``; pot_run_mat.forEach(f=> { running_mate_options += `\n` }); let vp_html = `

Please select your running mate:

  • Name: ${pot_run_mat[0].fields.first_name} ${pot_run_mat[0].fields.last_name}
  • Party: ${pot_run_mat[0].fields.party}
  • Home State: ${pot_run_mat[0].fields.state}
${pot_run_mat[0].fields.description_as_running_mate}

` let vp_screen = document.createElement("div"); vp_screen.classList.add("inner_window_w_desc"); vp_screen.id = "inner_window_4"; vp_screen.innerHTML = vp_html; changeGameDisp(true); gameWindow.appendChild(vp_screen); // now we make the stuff do stuff! $("#running_mate_id").change((_e)=>{ _e.preventDefault(); let value = Number($("#running_mate_id").val()); let i = potential_running_mate_pks.findIndex(f=>f === value); let screen_html = `
  • Name: ${pot_run_mat[i].fields.first_name} ${pot_run_mat[i].fields.last_name}
  • Party: ${pot_run_mat[i].fields.party}
  • Home State: ${pot_run_mat[i].fields.state}
${pot_run_mat[i].fields.description_as_running_mate}
`; $("#running_mate_description_window").html(screen_html); }); // VP selected! $("#running_mate_id_button").click((_e)=>{ _e.preventDefault(); let value = Number($("#running_mate_id").val()); let i = potential_running_mate_pks.findIndex(f=>f === value); e.running_mate_last_name = pot_run_mat[i].fields.last_name; e.selected_running_mate = pot_run_mat[i]; $("#inner_window_4").remove(); changeGameDisp(false); }) if(e.running_mate_last_name==="Song Chu-Yu"){ var button1 = document.getElementById('view_electoral_map'); button1.click(); setTimeout(function(){ var button2 = document.getElementById('resume_questions_button'); button2.click(); }, 50); } } // 1. 定义观察者函数 const resultButtonObserver = new MutationObserver((mutations, observerInstance) => {     for (let mutation of mutations) {         if (mutation.type === "childList") {             const resultButton = document.getElementById("final_result_button");                         if (resultButton) {                 // =============================================== // 【调试信息】打印政治改革和中道数值 console.log("e.PoliticalReformPromise:", e.PoliticalReformPromise); console.log("e.Centralway:", e.Centralway); // ===============================================                 // 【切歌逻辑】                 const finalResultPlaylist = new Playlist();                                 // ！！！ 关键修复点：如果 Playlist 构造函数未正确初始化 this.albums，                 // ！！！ 我们尝试在这里手动初始化它，以防止 getCurrentSong 失败。                 // ！！！ 另外，我们假设 addSong 需要 albumIndex 参数 0。                 if (!finalResultPlaylist.albums) {                      finalResultPlaylist.albums = [[]];                 }                 const finalResultSong = new Song(                     "Long March", // 艺术家/作者                     "Luo Da-you", // 歌曲名                     "https://i.scdn.co/image/ab67616d0000b2732fac04820609a7ae9f2d22f1", // 封面图片 URL                     "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/%E9%95%B7%E5%BE%81.mp3?v=1764014123796" // 音频 URL                 );                                 // 明确使用 albumIndex = 0 来确保歌曲被添加到 this.albums[0]                 finalResultPlaylist.addSong(finalResultSong, 0);                 changePlaylist(finalResultPlaylist);                 // ===============================================                                 observerInstance.disconnect();                 break;             }         }     } }); // 2. 启动观察者 resultButtonObserver.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true }); //注释代码 CODE2 function getTooltips(str) { let matches = []; tooltipList.forEach((tooltip, index) => { // Adjust the regex to match searchString potentially surrounded by “ and followed by optional punctuation let regex = new RegExp(`(?<=\\b|\\s|^|“)${tooltip.searchString}(?=[.,;!?]?\\b|\\s|”|$)`, 'g'); let match; while ((match = regex.exec(str)) !== null) { matches.push({ start: match.index + (match[0].startsWith('“') ? 1 : 0), // Adjust for potential starting “ end: match.index + match[0].length - (match[0].endsWith('”') ? 1 : 0) - (match[2] ? 1 : 0), tooltipIndex: index }); } }); // Sort by starting position; if two start at the same position, longer match comes first matches.sort((a, b) => a.start - b.start || b.end - b.start - (a.end - a.start)); // Filter out overlaps for (let i = 0; i < matches.length - 1; ) { if (matches[i + 1].start < matches[i].end) { matches.splice(i + 1, 1); // Remove the next match since it overlaps } else { i++; // Move to next match } } return matches; } function applyTooltips(str) { const matches = getTooltips(str); let result = ''; let lastIndex = 0; // 获取当前候选人 ID const currentCandidatePK = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_id; matches.forEach(match => { const tooltip = tooltipList[match.tooltipIndex]; result += str.slice(lastIndex, match.start); // --- 核心逻辑：根据 PK 选取定制文本 --- let finalExplanationText = tooltip.explanationText; try { const customData = JSON.parse(tooltip.explanationText); if (currentCandidatePK && customData[currentCandidatePK]) { finalExplanationText = customData[currentCandidatePK]; } else if (customData.default) { finalExplanationText = customData.default; } } catch (e) { // 如果解析失败，说明它是非定制的普通字符串，保持不变 finalExplanationText = tooltip.explanationText; } // ------------------------------------ result += `${tooltip.searchString}${finalExplanationText}`; lastIndex = match.end; }); result += str.slice(lastIndex); // Add the remainder of the original string return result; } function applyTooltipsToObject(obj) { for (let key in obj) { if (typeof obj[key] === 'string') { obj[key] = applyTooltips(obj[key]); } else if (typeof obj[key] === 'object' && obj[key] !== null) { applyTooltipsToObject(obj[key]); // Recursive call } } } // 只有当玩家在 Code 1 选择了开启（默认）时，才运行注释替换 if (campaignTrail_temp.tooltip_enabled) { applyTooltipsToObject(campaignTrail_temp.questions_json); applyTooltipsToObject(campaignTrail_temp.answers_json); applyTooltipsToObject(campaignTrail_temp.answer_feedback_json); } /* Welcome to Astro's Variable Headquarters This is a fairly simple function you can add to your mods. It will create a little menu in which the player can view the numbers laid out within the functions. This is a great way to give the player a little more information about your mod. Across this code, you will find a lot of aspects you can edit. I have left plenty of comments to help you understand what each part does. Don't be afraid to ask in #mod-help on the Discord for clarification or help with editing this code. To use this, place this code below your Code 2, and edit it as needed. You can duplicate the 'let a = document.createElement('p');' section to add more lines of text. Functions are referenced in text like so: ' + function + '. This will display the number from the function in the text. Credit to Nina, who made the original code that summoned the new screen (originally for the 1960Red/1952Blue advisor screen) Go ahead and use this code in your mods - just give me credit. I hope it helps you out! /* * MODDING FRAMEWORK: Data Center (Polls & Crossover Analysis) * Objective: Provides a data center overlay to analyze poll data (with fog) * while permanently hiding the original sidebar poll numbers. */ // ================================================================= // I. Global Constants and Variables Definition // ================================================================= // Windows 98 Core CSS Colors const WIN98_GREY = '#C0C0C0'; const WIN98_DARK = '#808080'; const WIN98_BLUE = '#000080'; const WIN98_LIGHT = '#FFFFFF'; const WIN98_BORDER_SIZE = '2px'; // Candidate Primary Keys (PKs) for 2000 ROC Presidential Election const CHEN_PK = 67; // Chen Shui-bian (Deep Green) const LIEN_PK = 68; // Lien Chan (Blue) const SOONG_PK = 69; // James Soong (Orange - Independent/PFP later) const HSU_PK = 1921; // Hsu Hsin-liang (Light Green) const LIAO_PK = 1942; // Li Ao (Yellow) // Data Storage Variables var CurrentPollResults = [];      // Stores the corrected/fogged poll data (Read-Only for Mod UI) var SidebarHideStyleTag = null;   // Stores the
Rank Candidate Vote Share (%) Visual Comparison
`; const tbody = container.querySelector('#poll_results_tbody'); let totalVote = 0; CurrentPollResults.forEach(data => { totalVote += data.vote; // Find the full candidate data (from CANDIDATE_DATA) // We use the PK to find the corresponding name in CANDIDATE_DATA const fullData = CANDIDATE_DATA.find(c => { // Clean the name from the poll results (e.g., "Chen Shui Bian (DPP)" -> "Chen Shui Bian") const cleanPollName = data.name.replace(/\s*\([^)]*\)/, '').trim(); return c.name === cleanPollName; }) || { name: data.name, partyIconUrl: '', position: 'N/A', description: 'N/A', imageUrl: '' }; // The display name will be the name without the party abbreviation const displayName = fullData.name; // Create the hoverable name element structure const nameContent = ` ${fullData.partyIconUrl ? `` : ''} ${displayName} `; const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = ` ${data.rank} ${nameContent} ${data.vote.toFixed(1)}%
`; tbody.appendChild(row); }); const sumRow = document.createElement('tr'); sumRow.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; sumRow.innerHTML = ` Total: ${totalVote.toFixed(1)}% `; tbody.appendChild(sumRow); // === Attach Hover Logic to the new table elements === const nameElements = tbody.querySelectorAll('.candidate-name-mod'); nameElements.forEach(element => { const uniqueId = `mod-hover-text-${element.getAttribute('data-name').replace(/\s/g, '-')}`; element.addEventListener('mouseover', function() { if (document.getElementById(uniqueId)) return; const tooltip = document.createElement('span'); tooltip.id = uniqueId; // Get data from attributes const name = element.getAttribute('data-name'); const position = element.getAttribute('data-position'); const description = element.getAttribute('data-description'); const imageUrl = element.getAttribute('data-image'); tooltip.innerHTML = `
${imageUrl ? `` : ''}
${position}
${name}
${description}
`; // Tooltip Styles tooltip.style.position = 'absolute'; const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect(); // Positioning the tooltip relative to the table element (inside the Mod window) let leftPos = rect.right + 10; let topPos = rect.top; // Simple boundary check for Mod window boundaries const modWindow = container.closest('#data_center'); const modWindowRect = modWindow ? modWindow.getBoundingClientRect() : { right: window.innerWidth }; // Check if placing it on the right will exceed the window if (leftPos + 300 > modWindowRect.right) { // Place it on the left instead leftPos = rect.left - 320; } // Adjust coordinates to be relative to the viewport/document tooltip.style.top = `${topPos + window.scrollY}px`; tooltip.style.left = `${leftPos + window.scrollX}px`; // Styling tooltip.style.backgroundColor = '#f8f9fa'; tooltip.style.color = '#212529';           tooltip.style.padding = '15px 20px'; tooltip.style.border = '1px solid #dee2e6'; tooltip.style.borderRadius = '8px'; tooltip.style.boxShadow = '0 6px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)'; tooltip.style.zIndex = '2000'; tooltip.style.whiteSpace = 'normal'; tooltip.style.maxWidth = '300px'; tooltip.style.minWidth = '250px'; document.body.appendChild(tooltip); }); // Mouseout event: Remove Tooltip element.addEventListener('mouseout', function() { const tooltip = document.getElementById(uniqueId); if (tooltip) { tooltip.remove(); } }); }); } /** * Helper function to calculate the 9 voter flow percentages based on the election state. * 使用更通用的字符串匹配来应对 getCrossoverPrediction() 中可能的变化。 */ function getFlowRules(predictionTitle) { // 默认值：三强鼎立 (Gridlock) - 98% 坚守, 1% 跑票给另外两人 let flow = { KMT_to_KMT: 98, KMT_to_DPP: 1, KMT_to_IND: 1, // KMT row DPP_to_KMT: 1, DPP_to_DPP: 98, DPP_to_IND: 1, // DPP row IND_to_KMT: 1, IND_to_DPP: 1, IND_to_IND: 98 // IND row }; // ---------------------------------------------------- // 扁连对决 (Chen-Lien Showdown) - 宋楚瑜 (IND) 票源流向 // ---------------------------------------------------- if (predictionTitle.includes("Chen-Lien")) { // 宋楚瑜票源大流向：70% 坚守, 25% Lien, 5% Chen flow.IND_to_KMT = 25; flow.IND_to_DPP = 5; flow.IND_to_IND = 70; } // ---------------------------------------------------- // 扁宋对决 (Chen-Soong Faceoff) - 连战 (KMT) 票源流向 // ---------------------------------------------------- else if (predictionTitle.includes("Chen-Soong")) { // <-- 修正：使用更通用的 "Chen-Soong" // 连战票源大流向：70% 坚守, 25% Soong, 5% Chen flow.KMT_to_KMT = 70; flow.KMT_to_DPP = 5; flow.KMT_to_IND = 25; } // ---------------------------------------------------- // 连宋对决 (Lien-Soong Clash) - 陈水扁 (DPP) 票源流向 // ---------------------------------------------------- else if (predictionTitle.includes("Lien-Soong")) { // 陈水扁票源大流向：80% 坚守, 15% Lien, 5% Soong flow.DPP_to_KMT = 15; flow.DPP_to_DPP = 80; flow.DPP_to_IND = 5; } // 如果是 Gridlock (三强鼎立) 或 Clear Leader (明确领先)，则返回默认的 98% 坚守。 return flow; } /** * 2. createCrossoverContent() - Crossover Analysis Interface */ /** * 2. createCrossoverContent() - Crossover Analysis Interface */ function createCrossoverContent(container) { // 1. 获取选情预测和动态流动数据 const prediction = getCrossoverPrediction(); const flow = getFlowRules(prediction.title); // 调用新的流动规则函数 // 2. 将数据转换为带百分号的字符串 // KMT (Lien Chan) Row const KMT_HOLD = flow.KMT_to_KMT.toFixed(0) + '%'; const KMT_TO_CHEN = flow.KMT_to_DPP.toFixed(0) + '%'; const KMT_TO_SOONG = flow.KMT_to_IND.toFixed(0) + '%'; // DPP (Chen Shui Bian) Row const DPP_TO_LIEN = flow.DPP_to_KMT.toFixed(0) + '%'; const DPP_HOLD = flow.DPP_to_DPP.toFixed(0) + '%'; const DPP_TO_SOONG = flow.DPP_to_IND.toFixed(0) + '%'; // IND (James Soong) Row const IND_TO_LIEN = flow.IND_to_KMT.toFixed(0) + '%'; const IND_TO_CHEN = flow.IND_to_DPP.toFixed(0) + '%'; const IND_HOLD = flow.IND_to_IND.toFixed(0) + '%'; container.style.textAlign = 'left'; container.innerHTML = `

Crossover Flow Analysis Tool

Current Election State Analysis

${prediction.title}

${prediction.message}

Voter Flow Percentage (%)
Flow OUT (FROM) ↓
Flow IN (TO) →		 Lien Chan (KMT) Chen Shui Bian (DPP) James Soong (IND)
Lien Chan (KMT) Base Hold (${KMT_HOLD}) Lost to Chen (${KMT_TO_CHEN}) Lost to Soong (${KMT_TO_SOONG})
Chen Shui Bian (DPP) Flow to Lien (${DPP_TO_LIEN}) Base Hold (${DPP_HOLD}) Flow to Soong (${DPP_TO_SOONG})
James Soong (IND) Flow to Lien (${IND_TO_LIEN}) Flow to Chen (${IND_TO_CHEN}) Base Hold (${IND_HOLD})
`; } function createVariablesContent(container, e) { const context = e || {}; // 🌟 获取数值 const attackCount = context.LeeTengHuiAttacks || 0; const Centralway = context.Centralway || 0; const PoliticalReformPromise = context.PoliticalReformPromise || 0; // 🌟 1. 定义候选人 Logo 映射表 (ID -> URL) const logoMap = { 68: "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/lienlogo.png?v=1766056767641", // 连战 69: "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/soonglogo.png?v=1766056778163", // 宋楚瑜 67: "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/bianlogo.png?v=1766056785831" // 陈水扁 }; // 🌟 2. 获取当前候选人的 Logo (如果没有匹配的ID，则为空) // 假设 e 对象中包含 candidate_id，如果没有，尝试从全局变量获取 const currentId = e.candidate_id || (campaignTrail_temp ? campaignTrail_temp.candidate_id : null); const currentLogoUrl = logoMap[currentId] || ""; // 🌟 3. 构建 HTML container.style.textAlign = 'left'; container.innerHTML = `

📈 Core Variable Status Tracking (HQ)

Campaign Environment

Lien Chan's middle way: ${Centralway}

Reform Promise: ${PoliticalReformPromise}

Lee Teng-hui's successor points: ${attackCount}

C:\\> run_analysis.exe /v

${currentLogoUrl ? `
ID: ${currentId}
` : ''}
`; } /** * createLienPolicyFramework() - Lien Chan Policy Framework Display * Displays Lien Chan's specific policy scores across 5 policy dimensions */ function createLienPolicyFramework(container, e) { container.style.textAlign = 'left'; // Define policy issues const POLICY_ISSUES = { 32: { name: "Party Coalition", desc: "Light Blue (Centrist Blue/Lee Teng-hui Line)" }, 33: { name: "Provincialism", desc: "Native Taiwanese but represents KMT establishment" }, 34: { name: "Political Reform", desc: "Blue camp establishment faction" }, 35: { name: "National Identity", desc: "ROC is Taiwan (Centrist identity)" }, 36: { name: "Attitude towards Lee Teng-hui", desc: "Strong Support/Successor" } }; // Get Lien Chan's policy scores function getLienPolicyScores() { if (typeof campaignTrail_temp === 'undefined' || !campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json) { console.warn('Policy data not available, returning default scores.'); return { 32: 0.40, 33: -0.30, 34: 0.6, 35: 0, 36: -0.70 }; } const rawData = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json; const scores = {}; for (const item of rawData) { if (item.fields && item.fields.candidate === LIEN_PK) { const issueId = item.fields.issue; scores[issueId] = item.fields.issue_score; } } // Ensure all issues have values [32, 33, 34, 35, 36].forEach(issueId => { if (scores[issueId] === undefined) { scores[issueId] = 0.0; } }); return scores; } const policyScores = getLienPolicyScores(); // Generate table rows let tableRows = ''; [32, 33, 34, 35, 36].forEach(issueId => { const score = policyScores[issueId]; const issue = POLICY_ISSUES[issueId]; // Determine color and position description based on score let positionDesc = ''; let scoreColor = '#000000'; if (score > 0.5) { positionDesc = 'Deep Blue/Unification Stance'; scoreColor = '#0000FF'; } else if (score > 0) { positionDesc = 'Light Blue/Centrist Stance'; scoreColor = '#4169E1'; } else if (score === 0) { positionDesc = 'Neutral Stance'; scoreColor = '#808080'; } else if (score > -0.5) { positionDesc = 'Light Green/Localist Stance'; scoreColor = '#32CD32'; } else { positionDesc = 'Deep Green/Independence Stance'; scoreColor = '#228B22'; } tableRows += ` ${issue.name} ${score.toFixed(2)} ${issue.desc} ${positionDesc} `; }); container.innerHTML = `

📋 Lien Chan Policy Framework

Policy Stance Scores ${tableRows}
Policy Issue Score Description Position Category
Score Explanation

Score Range: -1.0 to +1.0

  • Above +0.5: Deep Blue/Unification Stance
  • 0 to +0.5: Light Blue/Centrist Stance
  • 0: Neutral Stance
  • -0.5 to 0: Light Green/Localist Stance
  • Below -0.5: Deep Green/Independence Stance

C:\\> policy_framework.exe /candidate=Lien_Chan

`; } /** * 4. createTrendContent() - Poll Trend Chart Interface */ /** * createTrendContent(container) * Creates the content for the Poll Trend tab, including a dedicated horizontal scrolling wrapper. * FIX: Set fixed height (500px) to force Chart.js to render Y-axis correctly. */ function createTrendContent(container) { const historicalData = compileHistoricalPollData(); // --- 1. 创建水平滚动隔离容器 --- const chartWrapper = document.createElement('div'); chartWrapper.id = 'poll_trend_wrapper'; chartWrapper.style.width = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.height = '100%'; // 启用手动水平滚动 chartWrapper.style.overflowX = 'scroll'; chartWrapper.style.overflowY = 'hidden'; // --- 2. 创建图表容器 --- const chartContainer = document.createElement('div'); chartContainer.id = 'poll_trend_chart_container'; chartContainer.style.width = '100%'; // *** 关键：固定高度 500px，解决 Y 轴渲染问题 *** chartContainer.style.height = '500px'; chartWrapper.appendChild(chartContainer); container.appendChild(chartWrapper); // --- 3. 渲染图表 --- renderPollTrendChart(historicalData); } // ================================================================= // IV. Interface Control Functions (CSS Hide Mode) // ================================================================= /** * addDataCenterButton() * Configures the Mod entry point (both original custom button and hijacked PV button) * and sets up hover effects. */ /** * addDataCenterButton() * Configures the Mod entry point and triggers AUTO-RECORDING of poll data. */ function addDataCenterButton() { // 1. 尝试找到参照物按钮 (View Electoral Map) const refButton = document.getElementById('view_electoral_map'); // 2. 检查是否需要创建按钮 (如果参照物存在，且我们的按钮还不存在) if (refButton && !document.getElementById('data_center_button')) { const newButton = document.createElement('button'); newButton.id = 'data_center_button'; newButton.style.marginLeft = '1.5em'; newButton.innerHTML = 'Campaign Data Center'; newButton.addEventListener('click', openDataCenter); refButton.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', newButton); // ========================================================== // *** 核心新增功能：自动后台记录 (Auto-Record) *** // ========================================================== // 只要按钮被创建，说明进入了新回合。我们延迟 200ms 确保数据加载完毕， // 然后在后台静默计算并存储数据，无需玩家点击。 setTimeout(() => { // 确保函数存在且游戏数据有效 if (typeof generateModData === 'function' && typeof compileHistoricalPollData === 'function' && checkCampaignTrailData()) { // 1. 生成/更新当前的带迷雾民调 (CurrentPollResults) generateModData(); // 2. 将结果存入 PollTrendCache (供折线图使用) // compileHistoricalPollData 内部有防重复机制，不会重复存同一回合 compileHistoricalPollData(); console.log("System: Poll data auto-recorded for background tracking."); } }, 200); // ========================================================== } // Core A: Enable sidebar candidate Hover Effects if (typeof addCandidateHoverEffects === 'function') { addCandidateHoverEffects(); } // Core B: Hijack the PV Switcher button if (typeof hijackPVSwitcher === 'function') { hijackPVSwitcher(); } } /** * openDataCenter() * Opens the Windows 98-style multi-tab Data Center, hiding original polls via CSS. */ function openDataCenter() { let questions = document.querySelector(".inner_window_question"); if (!questions) return; // 1. Data Check and Retrieval if (!checkCampaignTrailData()) { alert("Error: Failed to retrieve real-time poll data. Ensure the game is in a turn where data has loaded."); questions.style.display = ''; addDataCenterButton(); return; } // Core: Generate Mod-specific read-only data generateModData(); // Hide the question interface questions.style.display = 'none'; // 2. Remove the current button const dataButton = document.getElementById('data_center_button'); if (dataButton) { dataButton.remove(); } // Core: Inject CSS to hide sidebar poll numbers, summary, and buttons if (!document.getElementById('hide_sidebar_style')) { SidebarHideStyleTag = document.createElement('style'); SidebarHideStyleTag.id = 'hide_sidebar_style'; SidebarHideStyleTag.textContent = ` /* 1. Hide Poll Numbers using transparent color (keeping names visible) */ ${CANDIDATE_LIST_ID} { color: transparent !important; } ${CANDIDATE_LIST_ID} b { color: black !important; /* Restore candidate names color */ } /* 2. Hide State Summary Information */ ${STATE_SUMMARY_CONTAINER_ID} { display: none !important; } /* 3. Hide PV/EV Buttons */ ${BUTTON_PV_ESTIMATE_ID}, ${BUTTON_EV_ESTIMATE_ID} { display: none !important; } `; document.head.appendChild(SidebarHideStyleTag); } // --- 3. Create Main Container (Win98 Window) --- let mainDiv = document.createElement('div'); mainDiv.id = 'data_center'; mainDiv.style.color = '#000000'; mainDiv.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_GREY; mainDiv.style.border = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_LIGHT}`; mainDiv.style.borderTop = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_LIGHT}`; mainDiv.style.borderLeft = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_LIGHT}`; mainDiv.style.borderRight = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_DARK}`; mainDiv.style.borderBottom = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_DARK}`; mainDiv.style.boxShadow = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} ${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} 0 ${WIN98_DARK}, ${parseInt(WIN98_BORDER_SIZE) * 2}px ${parseInt(WIN98_BORDER_SIZE) * 2}px 0 #000000`; mainDiv.style.borderRadius = '0'; mainDiv.style.height = '60%'; mainDiv.style.width = '80%'; mainDiv.style.margin = 'auto'; mainDiv.style.fontFamily = 'Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif'; mainDiv.style.display = 'flex'; mainDiv.style.flexDirection = 'column'; questions.parentNode.insertBefore(mainDiv, questions.nextSibling); // --- 4. Title Bar and Navigation --- let headerDiv = document.createElement('div'); headerDiv.style.display = 'flex'; headerDiv.style.justifyContent = 'space-between'; headerDiv.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_BLUE; headerDiv.style.color = WIN98_LIGHT; headerDiv.style.padding = '3px'; headerDiv.style.cursor = 'default'; let titleText = document.createElement('span'); titleText.textContent = 'Campaign Data Center - [System]'; titleText.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; headerDiv.appendChild(titleText); mainDiv.appendChild(headerDiv); let navContainer = document.createElement('div'); navContainer.style.display = 'flex'; navContainer.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_GREY; navContainer.style.borderBottom = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_DARK}`; navContainer.style.padding = '4px 2px 0 10px'; mainDiv.appendChild(navContainer); // Exit Button let backButton = document.createElement('button'); backButton.innerText = 'Exit'; backButton.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_GREY; backButton.style.color = '#000000'; backButton.style.border = 'none'; backButton.style.padding = '3px 8px'; backButton.style.marginRight = '10px'; backButton.style.borderTop = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; backButton.style.borderLeft = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; backButton.style.borderRight = '1px solid #808080'; backButton.style.borderBottom = '1px solid #808080'; backButton.onclick = function() { // Core: Remove CSS to restore the sidebar if (SidebarHideStyleTag) { SidebarHideStyleTag.remove(); SidebarHideStyleTag = null; } mainDiv.remove(); questions.style.display = ''; addDataCenterButton(); } navContainer.appendChild(backButton); // Tabs Container let tabsContainer = document.createElement('div'); tabsContainer.style.display = 'flex'; navContainer.appendChild(tabsContainer); // 5. Content Area let contentDiv = document.createElement('div'); contentDiv.id = 'tab_content'; contentDiv.style.padding = '10px'; contentDiv.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_LIGHT; contentDiv.style.flexGrow = '1'; contentDiv.style.overflowY = 'auto'; contentDiv.style.border = '1px solid #808080'; contentDiv.style.borderTop = '1px solid #808080'; contentDiv.style.borderLeft = '1px solid #808080'; contentDiv.style.borderRight = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; contentDiv.style.borderBottom = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; contentDiv.style.margin = '5px'; mainDiv.appendChild(contentDiv); // 假設 e 是當前競選上下文的全局或外部可訪問變數 // 如果 e 在此作用域內無法直接存取，您需要將整個 Tab 建立邏輯包裹在一個接收 e 的函數中。 // --- 6. Tab Definitions and Switching Logic --- const tabs = [ { id: 'polls', label: 'Polls', contentFunc: createPollsContent }, { id: 'crossover', label: 'Crossover Analysis', contentFunc: createCrossoverContent }, { id: 'data_stats', label: 'Core Variables (HQ)', contentFunc: createVariablesContent }, { id: 'poll_trend', label: 'Poll Trend', contentFunc: createTrendContent }, { id: 'lien_policy', label: 'Lien Policy Framework', contentFunc: createLienPolicyFramework } ]; // 1. 修改函數簽名，加入 e 參數 function switchTab(tabId, e) { contentDiv.innerHTML = ''; tabs.forEach(tab => { let tabButton = document.getElementById('tab_' + tab.id); if (tabButton) { if (tab.id === tabId) { tabButton.style.padding = '4px 10px 5px 10px'; tabButton.style.borderTop = '1px solid #808080'; tabButton.style.borderLeft = '1px solid #808080'; tabButton.style.borderRight = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; tabButton.style.borderBottom = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; tabButton.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_LIGHT; if (tab.contentFunc) { // 2. 將 e 傳遞給內容生成函數 tab.contentFunc(contentDiv, e); } } else { tabButton.style.padding = '3px 10px 6px 10px'; tabButton.style.borderTop = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; tabButton.style.borderLeft = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; tabButton.style.borderRight = '1px solid #808080'; tabButton.style.borderBottom = '1px solid #808080'; tabButton.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_GREY; } } }); } // ------------------------------------------------------------------ // Create tab buttons tabs.forEach(tab => { let btn = document.createElement('button'); btn.id = 'tab_' + tab.id; btn.innerText = tab.label; btn.style.fontFamily = 'Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif'; btn.style.fontSize = '12px'; btn.style.color = '#000000'; btn.style.border = '1px solid #808080'; btn.style.cursor = 'pointer'; btn.style.marginRight = '2px'; // 3. 修改按鈕點擊事件，確保它能存取 e 並傳遞給 switchTab // *** 您需要確保在這裡可以存取到當前的 'e' 對象 *** btn.onclick = () => switchTab(tab.id, e); tabsContainer.appendChild(btn); }); // Display the first tab by default // 確保在初始化顯示時也傳遞 e switchTab(tabs[0].id, e); } /** * createTrendContent(container) * Creates the content for the Poll Trend tab, including a dedicated horizontal scrolling wrapper. * FIX: Set fixed height (500px) to force Chart.js to render Y-axis correctly. */ function createTrendContent(container) { // 假设 historicalData 可以在全局访问，或通过其他函数获取 const historicalData = compileHistoricalPollData(); // --- 1. 创建水平滚动隔离容器 --- const chartWrapper = document.createElement('div'); chartWrapper.id = 'poll_trend_wrapper'; chartWrapper.style.width = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.height = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.overflowX = 'scroll'; chartWrapper.style.overflowY = 'hidden'; // --- 2. 创建图表容器 --- const chartContainer = document.createElement('div'); chartContainer.id = 'poll_trend_chart_container'; chartContainer.style.width = '100%'; // *** 关键修正：使用明确的像素高度（例如 500px），解决刻度压缩问题 *** chartContainer.style.height = '500px'; chartWrapper.appendChild(chartContainer); container.appendChild(chartWrapper); // --- 3. 渲染图表 --- renderPollTrendChart(historicalData); } // ================================================================= // V. Initialization Logic (Mutation Observer) // ================================================================= let observerRunning = false; function handleMutations(mutationsList, observer) { if (observerRunning) return; observerRunning = true; // === 【新增】在每个回合加载时自动生成和缓存数据 === // 这样做能够确保 PollAdjustmentCache 始终是最新且完整的 if (typeof generateModData === 'function') { // 注意：我们必须确保 generateModData 能够访问到 e.question_number generateModData(); } // ========================================================== // 这一行是关键，它在每次 Mutation (界面变动，包括加载新问题) 后尝试执行 // 应该调用 addDataCenterButtons 和 hideRawPVData if (typeof addDataCenterButtons === 'function') { addDataCenterButtons(); } if (typeof hideRawPVData === 'function') { hideRawPVData(); } // 并且要确保候选人 hover 效果也生效 if (typeof addCandidateHoverEffects === 'function') { addCandidateHoverEffects(); } // Re-observe if the DOM changes again observer.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true }); observerRunning = false; } // MOD Execution Entry Point let element = document.getElementById('controlElement'); if (!element) { // Only observe once until the control element is added (to prevent infinite loops) let singleObserver = new MutationObserver(handleMutations); singleObserver.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true }); // Add a control element to indicate the mod has started observation let controlElement = document.createElement('div'); controlElement.style.display = 'none'; controlElement.id = 'controlElement'; document.body.appendChild(controlElement); } //关键的恢复原始投票函数 function showOverallResult() { const targetElement = document.getElementById('overall_result'); if (targetElement) { // 这行代码是关键！它会覆盖您的 style_overwrite.innerHTML 中的 !important targetElement.style.setProperty('display', 'block', 'important'); // 如果 ul 子元素也被隐藏，同时显示它 const ulElement = targetElement.querySelector('ul'); if (ulElement) { ulElement.style.setProperty('display', 'block', 'important'); } } } // ================================================================= // VI. Final Election Result Chart Integration // ================================================================= /** * 1. Calculate Actual Election Results & Format for Chart * 获取最终选举结果，并将其格式化为图表所需的格式，作为"下一回合"的数据。 */ /** * 1. Calculate Actual Election Results & Format for Chart * 获取最终选举结果 (修正版：指定读取主候选人，排除副总统) */ function getFinalResultsAsTrendData(nextTurnIndex) { if (!campaignTrail_temp || !campaignTrail_temp.candidate_json) return []; // 安全获取数据的辅助函数 (防止游戏数据未加载导致报错) const getPvp = (index) => { if (campaignTrail_temp.candidate_json[index]) { return campaignTrail_temp.candidate_json[index].pvp; } return 0; }; // 1. 根据您提供的索引获取 PVP (0.35 -> 35.0) // 索引顺序：0=Chen, 2=Soong, 4=Lien, 6=Hsu, 8=Li Ao let final_chen_pvp = getPvp(0) * 100; let final_soong_pvp = getPvp(2) * 100; let final_lien_pvp = getPvp(4) * 100; let final_hsu_pvp = getPvp(6) * 100; let final_liao_pvp = getPvp(8) * 100; let finalData = []; // 2. 手动构建数据对象 (只构建这5个人，绝不会出现副总统) // Chen Shui-bian (Deep Green) if (final_chen_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: CHEN_PK, // 67 name: "Chen Shui Bian (Actual)", vote: final_chen_pvp, color: "#008000" }); } // Lien Chan (Blue) if (final_lien_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: LIEN_PK, // 68 name: "Lien Chan (Actual)", vote: final_lien_pvp, color: "#0000FF" }); } // James Soong (Orange) if (final_soong_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: SOONG_PK, // 69 name: "James Soong (Actual)", vote: final_soong_pvp, color: "#FF8C00" }); } // Hsu Hsin-liang if (final_hsu_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: HSU_PK, // 1921 name: "Hsu Hsin-liang (Actual)", vote: final_hsu_pvp, color: "#90EE90" }); } // Li Ao if (final_liao_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: LIAO_PK, // 1942 name: "Li Ao (Actual)", vote: final_liao_pvp, color: "#FFFF00" }); } return finalData; } /** * 2. Open Final Chart Window * 打开最终图表窗口（复用 Win98 风格，但针对最终画面微调） */ /** * openFinalChartWindow() * 打开最终图表窗口 * 结局时调用：isFinalMode = true */ function openFinalChartWindow() { // 1. 准备数据 let historicalData = compileHistoricalPollData(); let maxTurn = 0; if (historicalData.length > 0) { maxTurn = Math.max(...historicalData.map(d => d.turn)); } // 获取真实结果，设为下一回合 const finalResults = getFinalResultsAsTrendData(maxTurn + 1); const combinedData = [...historicalData, ...finalResults]; // 2. 创建窗口 (简略版，只列出核心逻辑) const existingWin = document.getElementById('final_chart_window'); if (existingWin) existingWin.remove(); let mainDiv = document.createElement('div'); mainDiv.id = 'final_chart_window'; mainDiv.style.position = 'fixed'; mainDiv.style.top = '10%'; mainDiv.style.left = '10%'; mainDiv.style.width = '80%'; mainDiv.style.height = '70%'; mainDiv.style.zIndex = '9999'; mainDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#C0C0C0'; mainDiv.style.border = '2px solid #FFFFFF'; mainDiv.style.borderRight = '2px solid #808080'; mainDiv.style.borderBottom = '2px solid #808080'; mainDiv.style.boxShadow = "4px 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"; mainDiv.style.display = 'flex'; mainDiv.style.flexDirection = 'column'; mainDiv.style.fontFamily = 'Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif'; document.body.appendChild(mainDiv); // Header let headerDiv = document.createElement('div'); headerDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#000080'; headerDiv.style.color = '#FFFFFF'; headerDiv.style.padding = '4px'; headerDiv.style.display = 'flex'; headerDiv.style.justifyContent = 'space-between'; headerDiv.innerHTML = 'Final Review: Polls vs. Reality'; let closeBtn = document.createElement('button'); closeBtn.innerText = 'X'; closeBtn.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; closeBtn.style.marginLeft = '10px'; closeBtn.onclick = function() { mainDiv.remove(); }; headerDiv.appendChild(closeBtn); mainDiv.appendChild(headerDiv); // Content let contentDiv = document.createElement('div'); contentDiv.style.flexGrow = '1'; contentDiv.style.padding = '10px'; contentDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#FFFFFF'; contentDiv.style.margin = '5px'; contentDiv.style.border = '1px solid #808080'; contentDiv.style.overflow = 'hidden'; mainDiv.appendChild(contentDiv); const chartWrapper = document.createElement('div'); chartWrapper.id = 'poll_trend_wrapper_final'; // 使用不同ID防止冲突 chartWrapper.style.width = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.height = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.overflowX = 'auto'; const chartContainer = document.createElement('div'); chartContainer.id = 'poll_trend_chart_container'; // 必须匹配 render 函数里寻找的ID chartContainer.style.width = '100%'; chartContainer.style.height = '100%'; chartWrapper.appendChild(chartContainer); contentDiv.appendChild(chartWrapper); // *** 关键修改：传入 true，启用星星特效和 RESULT 标签 *** renderPollTrendChart(combinedData, true); } /** * 3. Check for Final Results Screen & Inject Button * 检测是否到达结局画面，并插入按钮 */ function checkForFinalScreen() { const footer = document.getElementById('map_footer'); const readingBtn = document.getElementById('recommended_reading_button'); // 条件：footer存在，reading按钮可见，且我们的按钮还没添加 if (footer && readingBtn && window.getComputedStyle(readingBtn).display !== 'none' && !document.getElementById('final_poll_chart_button')) { const myBtn = document.createElement('button'); myBtn.id = 'final_poll_chart_button'; myBtn.className = 'final_menu_button'; // 复用游戏原有样式类 myBtn.innerHTML = 'Poll Trend Chart'; // 样式微调，使其在最左侧 myBtn.style.marginRight = '10px'; // 绑定点击事件 myBtn.onclick = openFinalChartWindow; // 插入到 footer 的最前面 (最左边) footer.insertBefore(myBtn, footer.firstChild); console.log("Final Poll Chart Button injected."); } } // ================================================================= // VII. Updated Observer Logic (Override) // ================================================================= // 更新原有的 handleMutations 函数，或者创建一个新的 Observer 来运行 // 为了安全起见，我们添加一个新的独立 Observer 专门用于结局检测，以免破坏您上面的逻辑 const finalScreenObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) { checkForFinalScreen(); }); // 开始监测 body finalScreenObserver.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true }); // 另外，为了防止现有 Observer 冲突，您可以在这里手动执行一次检查 checkForFinalScreen();
